author: Aammir Mirza

inputs.label: List of VMs E.g: 'VM1,VM2,VM3'

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: ResourceGroupName

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select aprropriate action to perform on the Virtual Machine(s)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
